description: Tony DiAngelo opines: I know that Chase Hunter is a hot man that anyone would desire. It's no wonder I don't want him outta my sight. Take our neighbors Jason Andrews and Scott Free. I know they'd like to pounce on him. I can feel it. They peer at him, leering with mischief on their minds. But Chase is mine and all those two can do is suck and fuck each other like they imagine Chase and I do. They can take all their fetid frustrations and ride roughshod over each other (and I bet they do!), but their maddening trysts will never match ours.
title: Hold Me Again, Scene #01
